snippet: Pope Benedict XVI took his leave of parish priests and clergy of the diocese of Rome and indicated that he would not hold a public role once his resignation becomes official on Feb. 28.
abstract: Pope Benedict XVI takes leave of parish priests and clergy of diocese of Rome and indicates that he will not hold public role once his resignation becomes official on February 28.
lead_paragraph: Pope Benedict XVI took his leave of parish priests and clergy of the diocese of Rome and indicated that he would not hold a public role once his resignation becomes official on Feb. 28.

headline.seo: Benedict Says He’ll Be ‘Hidden to the World’
headline.main: Pope Says He Will Be ‘Hidden to the World’ in Retirement
headline.print_headline: Pope Says He Will Soon Be ‘Hidden to the World’
